description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

trial type= 4-cup: Two different quantities of juice (14 ml and 28 ml) were transferred from a pair of identical clear cups to a single cup and a set of 4 cups./ 8-cup: Two different quantities of juice (14 ml and 28 ml) were transferred from a pair of identical clear cups to a single cup and a set of 8 cups / no testing trial

ls trial: In half of the trials the larger quantity was poured into the single cup and the smaller quantity into the set of multiple cups/ lm trial : In the other half of the trials the larger quantity was poured into the set of multiple cups and the smaller quantity into the single cup
amount chosen in the 1st choice - smaller quantity (14 ml)/ larger quantity (28 ml)
amount chosen in the 2nd choice - smaller quantity  (14 ml)/ larger quantity (28 ml)/ no value for no testing trials
container chosen in the 2nd choice - single cup / multiple cups / no value for no testing trials
hesitation in the 1st choice- hesitation/ no hesitation
hesitation in the 2nd choice- hesitation/ no hesitation
